content.text:
# Ancient Orient Museum

}}
The  is a private museum in Tokyo, Japan, specializing in artifacts of the ancient Near East and Central Asia. Its permanent exhibit features a collection of Greco-Buddhist art of Gandhara, and several works of art pertaining to the art of ancient Palmyra and Persia.
Location
The museum is located in the Sunshine City complex in Ikebukuro, on the 7th floor of the .
History
The Ancient Orient Museum was opened on 5 October 1978.
